mapper.select: select r.nombre as r_nombre, r.id_interno as r_id_interno, tr.tipo as tr_tipo, re.fecha_ini, re.fecha_fin, u.nombre as u_nombre, u.id as u_id from recurso as r left join tipo_recurso as tr on r.id_tipo=tr.id left join reserva as re on r.id_interno=re.id_recurso left join usuario as u on u.id=re.id_usuario where u.id=#{id};

select r.nombre as r_nombre, r.id_interno as r_id_interno, tr.tipo as tr_tipo, re.fecha_ini, re.fecha_fin, u.nombre as u_nombre, u.id as u_id from recurso as r left join tipo_recurso as tr on r.id_tipo=tr.id left join reserva as re on r.id_interno=re.id_recurso left join usuario as u on u.id=re.id_usuario where u.id is not null;

select r.nombre as r_nombre, r.id_interno as r_id_interno, tr.tipo as tr_tipo, re.fecha_ini, re.fecha_fin, u.nombre as u_nombre, u.id as u_id from recurso as r left join tipo_recurso as tr on r.id_tipo=tr.id left join reserva as re on r.id_interno=re.id_recurso left join usuario as u on u.id=re.id_usuario where re.id=#{recurso.identificadorInterno};
